worklogs.comment:
shanhuuang opened a new pull request #10627:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/10627


   …ACKED. Only works for int32/int64 when delta_bit_width_<=32
   
   1. Update the implement of DeltaBitPackDecoder
   2. Revise the code of putting/getting ZigZag int and the unit test
   3. Add the implement of putting/getting ZigZag int64 and unit test

     // Read bits of v that crossed into new buffered_values_
-    *v = *v | static_cast<T>(BitUtil::TrailingBits(*buffered_values, *bit_offset)
-                             << (num_bits - *bit_offset));

issuetype.description: A new feature of the product, which has yet to be developed.
issuetype.name: New Feature

fields.description:
The following changes will be made:
 # Fix bugs in current BitReader::GetZigZagVlqInt
 and add support for BitReader::GetZigZagVlqInt64.
 # Support for situation that num_bits is greater than 32 in BitReader::GetBatch. Add unpack function for uint64_t values.
fields.summary: [C++][Parquet] Support for DeltaBitPackDecoder to read DELTA_BINARY_PACKED value and add unit tests

comments.body: [~shanhuang] while parquet and arrow code are merged into one repo we still used Parquet Jira trackers for core changes.  Going to close this as a duplicate of: PARQUET-490
Transitioning issue from Resolved to Closed to based on resolution field value.
